oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Formation of (E)-[FcC(PS2(OR)(2))= CH(PS2(OR)(2))] (R = Me, Et, Pr-i) in photolytic reactions of ferrocenylacetylene and [(RO)(2)PS2H] in hexane/alcohols: Experimental and DFT study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MATHUR, P
JI, RS
PATHAK, B
MOBIN, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ethene
Dialkyldithiophosphate
Crystal structure
DFT
ORGANIC SULFUR COMPOUNDS
UNSATURATED-COMPOUNDS

SOLID-STATE
THIOLS
DENSITY
ACID
OLIGODEOXYNUCLEOTIDES
PHOSPHORODITHIOATES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photochemical reactions of ferrocenylacetylene with dialkyldithiophosphoric acid in hexane at low temperature led to the formation of (E)-[FcC(PS2(OR)(2))-CH(PS2(OR)(2))] (R = Me, Et, Pr-i). Formation of these compounds have been studied experimentally and computationally in different solvents. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
